Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have see that the save file is getting bigger, is no problem in terms of space but I think the game takes more time to load the file and some time do not read it right.

To that end I like to suggest that only crafts and positions are save in the save file, all other data is better save in another file.

For example the contracts , technologies , research, resources and so on are store in a different file and only use if needed, like technologies the game don't need to know the tech unlock all the time, and what about the contracts and other stuff don't need to load all the time.

I know im suggesting/asking for something that will give work to developers but I think is the only way to keep all files clean and unnecessary loading time.

Its just a idea (nothing more )

Best Regards

Custume
